item.title: The Sauce-Packet Squeeze
item.description: Today in Tedium: Alright, I’d like to do a quick survey. (This is optional, but it would be nice if you humored me.) OK, here goes: Step away from your computer for ten to fifteen seconds and look in your fridge, particularly the door area of the fridge. (Waits â€¦) Do you have any sauce packets just sitting around? If so, how many, and where did they come from? And why did you keep them?
